description: NRC has a requirement to maintain the Lab air quality system supplied by Airgenuity. The work will involve sensor exchange, functional testing, element replacement, replacement of electronic components, vacuum test of the air sampling networks, and system (Factory software) configuration.

full_summary:
#### Airquity System Preventative Maintenance Service
#### Contrat de service de maintenance préventive du système Airquity

##### Tender Reference Information

* **Reference:** cb-788-8001793
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 24-58023
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-01
* **Closing Date:** 2024-05-15T14:00:00 (expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2029-05-31

##### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice (Préavis d'attribution du contrat)
* **Selection Criteria:** Not applicable
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to suppliers who have entered into a trade agreement with the Government of Canada, including:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

##### Project Description

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) requires a contractor to maintain the Airquity system for laboratory quality control. The scope of the project includes:

* Sensor replacement, functional testing, and element replacement
* Replacement of failed or non-operating electronic components
* Vacuum testing of the air sampling networks for branch integrity
* Confirmation of low-voltage power connections for the systems
* Configuration and testing of the system software
* Verification of system reporting graphs and performance

##### Contact Information

* **Name:** Collin Long
* **Email:** Collin.Long@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 343-549-1549
* **Address:** 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada

##### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available in English and French at the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37363/24-58023---airquity-system-pre
